Title: XXX.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Dan Shotz, Tyler Van Patten (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Flint submits himself to Billy's authority; Eleanor tries to find a way to save Rogers; Silver is forced to become the leader of the war to reclaim Nassau.
